questTheSpire:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

questTheSpire:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
questTheSpire:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

questTheSpire:PerkPoints.NAME: Perk Point Bonuses
questTheSpire:PerkPoints.FLAVOR: The power of completing the cycle many times.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start combat with perk point bonuses applied.

questTheSpire:DrawAspect.NAME: Aspect of Draw
questTheSpire:DrawAspect.FLAVOR: One of many aspects of power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw one more card at the start of your turn.

questTheSpire:GreedAspect.NAME: Aspect of Greed
questTheSpire:GreedAspect.FLAVOR: One of many aspects of power.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each act gain 100 gold.

questTheSpire:PyramidAspect.NAME: Aspect of the Pyramid
questTheSpire:PyramidAspect.FLAVOR: One of many aspects of power.

questTheSpire:DodecahedronAspect.NAME: Aspect of the Dodecahedron
questTheSpire:DodecahedronAspect.FLAVOR: One of many aspects of power.
DESCRIPTIONS: When at full health gain 1 energy at the start of your turn.

questTheSpire:HoarderAspect.NAME: Aspect of the Hoarder
questTheSpire:HoarderAspect.FLAVOR: One of many aspects of power.
DESCRIPTIONS: You retain this character's gold at the end of this run for this characters next run.
